scripts.report:open: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir='aurora-reports';if(!fs.existsSync(dir)){console.error('No aurora-reports directory. Run tests first.');process.exit(1);}const files=fs.readdirSync(dir).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.html')).map(f=>({f, t:fs.statSync(path.join(dir,f)).mtimeMs})).sort((a,b)=>b.t-a.t);if(!files.length){console.error('No HTML reports found.');process.exit(1);}const latest=path.join(dir,files[0].f);console.log('Opening', latest);require('child_process').exec(process.platform==='win32'?`start "" "${latest}"`:(process.platform==='darwin'?`open "${latest}"`:`xdg-open "${latest}"`));"
scripts.test:html: npm run test && npm run report:open
